meanings.definition: A person who manages and takes care of animals in a zoo.
meanings.sent1: The zookeepers fed the lions every morning.
meanings.sent2: The zookeepers work hard to ensure all animals are healthy.
meanings.sent3: The zookeepers had a race to see who could clean the monkey enclosure the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The zookeepers are the guardians of the animal kingdom within the zoo walls.
meanings.sent5: The zookeepers' dedication to their furry charges is truly admirable.

meanings.definition: Those who are responsible for the well-being and safety of animals in a zoo.
meanings.sent1: The zookeepers checked the locks on all the cages before closing time.
meanings.sent2: Visitors often thank the zookeepers for their hard work in caring for the animals.
meanings.sent3: The zookeepers organized a surprise birthday party for the oldest elephant in the zoo.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of the animals, the zookeepers are the protectors of their world.
meanings.sent5: The zookeepers' love for the animals shines through in everything they do.
